name: JSON:Presenter
description: A demo presentation that outlines the features of JSON:Presenter

slide 1: JSON:Presenter© lets you create PowerPoint-like presentations that can be run anywhere equipped with a suitable presentation engine; most notably in a web browser.
Web-based presentations can run from any host, including static; all you need is one CDN-hosted JavaScript file and you're good to go.
Rather than being created in a GUI, presentations are JSON text files having a format that can be implemented by any suitable engine.
The first engine available is a component of the EasyCoder™ browser scripting language but it can be used completely independently of the latter.
